prompt:

"""

After that, I drove my daughter home. Another important detail is that it was around six a clock at the time I picked my daughter up.
"""

Is the author in the wrong? Answer A for Yes (the author is in the wrong) and B for No (the author is not in the wrong). Answer nothing else.

But if the friend is left stranded without any other means, maybe the parent should have offered a ride.
